item.description:
Join NHCer Josh at a Professional Networking Happy Hour.

The New Haven County Bar Association, Young Lawyers Section is hosting a Young Professional Networking Happy Hour at Black Bear Saloon in New Haven on Thursday, October 27, 2011.  The event is from 5:30 – 8:00.  This event is a great opportunity for young professionals from Connecticut to meet each other, share ideas, contacts and referrals.

Drink Specials and Free Food:  Black Bear will be providing $3 drafts and $3 well drinks.  Black Bear will also be providing free appetizers to all attendees.

Josh is Hosting the Event and can be reached at 203-772-0070 if you have any questions.

Don't Forget your Business Cards!

For Happy Hour type Events, please note in your RSVP section if you are only a "Maybe".
item.how_to_find_us: Josh is hosting this meetup and can be reached at 203-772-0070, several groups will be there to mingle with.
item.name: Young Professional Networking Happy Hour
